tweet: High productivity is found somewhere near the center of a fear > comfort spectrum. The good stuff lives in the middle.
Human motivation discussion: "Do It Because You Like It" - Dan Pink - http://bit.ly/mxmhe
Everyone is a brand, but now w/Social Media companies don't own the Brand, so where does that leave us: we don't own our personal brand?
We build brand capital by what we do for others (the pull) but when we start bragging about what we can do (the push) we spend it.
This remains true - if your creativity can be commoditized like one stalk in a corn field, it just isn't that creative.
